Package affective.core

Class ArffLexiconWordLabeller

  • java.lang.Object
    • affective.core.ArffLexiconWordLabeller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, OptionHandler
    public class ArffLexiconWordLabeller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, OptionHandler
    This class is used for labeling words using lexicons in arff format. Numeric associations are added and nominal ones are counted.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Felipe Bravo-Marquez (fbravoma@waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:
